item.title: Clear Polycarbonate Deluxe Storage Box, 18" x 26" x 9"
item.description:
Ideal for keeping bulk produce, fish, poultry, and more fresh, this rectangular heavy weight food storage box is essential to any kitchen. Crafted from clear polycarbonate plastic, it is stain and odor-resistant, extremely durable, and can withstand temperatures from -40 degrees Fahrenheit to 160 degrees Fahrenheit. It features molded-in handles that make the transport of this box easy. Available in multiple sizes, choose the one to suit your kitchen needs. Use the corresponding lid to preserve the freshness of the products you store in this box.

item.title: 2 Gallon (40 Cup) Stackable Shelf Ingredient Bin
item.description: Perfect for storing and keeping dry, bulky ingredients fresh, this useful 2-gallon shelf ingredient bin allows quick access to essential ingredients. Its one-handed lift lid design increases food preparation efficiency and its ribbed top and bottom ensure a secure fit for other stacked bins. The clear plastic front lid enables easy viewing of contents in the bin so you do not have to guess what's in the container. Included in the bin is a white plastic scoop with a dedicated clip for sanitation compliance. Available in three sizes, these bins are lightweight yet heavy-duty, easy to clean, and stackable to provide additional storage space for your convenience.

item.title: Natural Wood Frame 23" x 24" Marker Board
item.description: Post lunch specials and special announcements in eye-catching neon colors using this marker board. Create your illustrations tailored to your establishment to catch patrons' attention with bright, vibrant, fun neon markers. Unlike chalkboards, this marker board's surface is designed for frequent erasing and rewriting with the high-tech absol-flat glossy surface that can easily be cleaned and allows for mess free writing, while having the appearance of a charming chalkboard. The solid natural oak frame featured double reinforced joints for added durability. Hang it on the wall or from the ceiling. This marker board comes with 1 standard white color marker and eraser. For the most vivid, unique design, use multiple deluxe plus neon markers. This marker board is also the way for busy households to post reminders and family announcements that cannot be missed!

item.title: 3' x 10' Charcoal Carpet Floor Mat
item.description:
Help guests, patrons and employees make a safe entrance way placing this grey charcoal carpet by the front door to absorb dirt and moisture. The olefin fiber material is fade-resistant and capable of holding more than one gallon of water per square yard. Grooves in the carpet help remove dirt, mud and debris from the bottom of shoes, while fibers trap dirt and moisture to protect floors. Non-slip vinyl backing ensures the carpet lays flat and prevents curling or rippling. Ideal for high-volume kitchens and outdoor parties, this rug offers a safe walking path in slippery areas. This carpet is easy to keep clean with a hose, broom or vacuum. This carpet is available in three different sizes to fit your needs.

*Please note -- this item does not qualify for free shipping.

item.title: 2.5 L Stainless Steel Lever Top Airpot, Stainless Steel-Lined
item.description: Whether you're hosting an event, opening a coffee shop, standing sideline at your child's soccer game on a chilly fall day, or hanging out with friends by a campfire, make sure you don't leave this stainless steel lined airpot at home. Simply open the top of the airpot to fill it with coffee, tea or hot cocoa to enjoy on the go. The double wall construction keeps beverages hot at 175 degrees Fahrenheit for up to ten hours or 151 degrees Fahrenheit up to twenty-four hours. The commercial-grade satin-finish stainless steel construction will resist rust and corrosion. Featuring a lever top that lets friends easily serve themselves a hot beverage and a large plastic top handle for easy carrying, the airpot is durable enough for everyday use. Available in both 2.5L and 3L to accommodate your needs, the airpot is also available with an orange lever top to easily distinguish decaf drinks from regular beverages.

item.title: Revol 1768 Revolution 7 Oz. Round Individual White Cocotte with Pepper Red Lid
item.description: Creating customized individual servings for soup, dinner, and dessert is simple with this 7 ounce miniature cocotte. Whether you’re cooking on an electric top, stovetop, or induction top, this versatile cocotte will become your favorite single-serving cookware piece. Revol’s ceramic French design is lighter than cast iron, making it easy for you to handle and transfer the cocotte from oven to tabletop. With a non-stick surface that does not scratch, there is no concern of flakes in your French onion soup, so you can cook and bake worry-free. Even heating and cooking ensures that your servings of savory peach cobbler or indulgent brownies will come out of the oven without being under-baked in the middle. For added convenience, this cocotte is dishwasher safe. Available in a variety of sizes to best suit your preference.

item.title: Revol 1768 White Drapeaux: Royaume Uni Cappuccino Tumbler Crumple Cup
item.description: Made from porcelain, you’ll find yourself reaching for this United-Kingdom-inspired cappuccino cup to kick-start your morning with the rich taste of coffee. The crumpled design of the cup gives it a unique style that is both simple and artistic. Crafted from a disposable plastic cup reproduced into porcelain, this cup retains heat and can be used to bake a single muffin, cake, or your other favorite oven-baked dessert. With the added benefit of being microwave safe, you can grab this cup to heat yourself a batch of oatmeal or reheat chicken noodle soup any time you want.
